<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>help_user_interaction</collection> <condition/> <description>This BR captures the mentioned payload whenever a new record is inserted of type Guided Setup.</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="help_user_interaction">guidance.type=global_setup^EQ<item display_value="Global Setup" endquery="false" field="guidance.type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="global_setup"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>on_launch_of_guidance</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
var data = {
sys_scope: current.guidance && current.guidance.sys_scope.getDisplayValue(), sys_package: current.guidance && current.guidance.sys_package.getDisplayValue(), snc_created: current.guidance && current.guidance.snc_created, stream_name: "on_launch_of_guidance"
};
var controller = new SNHelpSetupAnalyticsController(); controller.logData(controller.CATEGORY, controller.POINT, controller.SETUP_START_TASK_COMPLETION_EVENT, data);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-03 07:55:51</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>370d2bbfcb5581101b8d1f2ae8076d21</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>on_launch_of_guidance</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Guided Setup" source="sn_ads_setup">1cb77a801b9af01039c155f3604bcb9e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Guided Setup">1cb77a801b9af01039c155f3604bcb9e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_370d2bbfcb5581101b8d1f2ae8076d21</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-07-19 09:35:40</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async_always</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=370d2bbfcb5581101b8d1f2ae8076d21"/> </record_update>
